languages.text: "Лорд-капитан?!" {n}Идира поворачивает к вам голову, но ее безумный взгляд, на мгновение задержавшись на вашем лице, тут же соскальзывает с него. Вблизи вы видите, что основание одного из височных {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантов{/g} Идиры почернело и оплавилось.{/n} "Нет... погодите... Лорд-капитан... Леди фон Валанциус!" {n}Идира поднимает глаза на "Теодору", стоящую прямо перед ней. По ее щекам начинают катиться слезы.{/n} "Вы... вы вернулись..."

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан?!" {n}Идира поворачивает к вам голову, но ее безумный взгляд, на мгновение задержавшись на вашем лице, тут же соскальзывает с него. Вблизи вы видите, что основание одного из височных имплантов Идиры почернело и оплавилось.{/n} "Нет... погодите... Лорд-капитан... Леди фон Валанциус!" {n}Идира поднимает глаза на "Теодору", стоящую прямо перед ней. По ее щекам начинают катиться слезы.{/n} "Вы... вы вернулись..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Idira turns her head to you, but her demented gaze only rests briefly on your face before sliding away. Up close you can see that the base of one of Idira's temple {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} has blackened and melted.{/n} "No... Wait... Lord Captain... Lady von Valancius!" {n}Idira raises her eyes to "Theodora," who stands before her. Tears stream down Idira's cheeks.{/n} "You... you came back..."

languages.text: “舰长大人？”{n}伊迪拉把头转向你，但她呆滞的目光仅仅是在你的脸上短暂停留了片刻，随后便移开了视线。你近距离盯着她，看到她安在太阳穴的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}底座已经开始发黑，熔化。{/n}“不……等等……舰长大人……冯·瓦兰修斯夫人！”{n}伊迪拉抬起头，看着站在她面前的“西奥多拉”。泪水顺着她的脸颊流了下来。{/n}“您……您回来了……”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Idira turns her head to you, but her demented gaze only rests briefly on your face before sliding away. Up close you can see that the base of one of Idira's temple {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} has blackened and melted.{/n} "No... Wait... Lord Captain... Lady von Valancius!" {n}Idira raises her eyes to "Theodora," who stands before her. Tears stream down Idira's cheeks.{/n} "You... you came back..."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人？”{n}伊迪拉把头转向你，但她呆滞的目光仅仅是在你的脸上短暂停留了片刻，随后便移开了视线。你近距离盯着她，看到她安在太阳穴的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}底座已经开始发黑，熔化。{/n}“不……等等……舰长大人……冯·瓦兰修斯夫人！”{n}伊迪拉抬起头，看着站在她面前的“西奥多拉”。泪水顺着她的脸颊流了下来。{/n}“您……您回来了……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¿Lord Capitán?». {n}Idira gira la cabeza hacia ti, pero su mirada demente solo se fija en ti durante un momento. De cerca puedes ver que la base de uno de los {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} de sus sienes ha ennegrecido y se ha derretido.{/n} «No... Espere... Lord Capitán... Lady von Valancius!». {n}Idira alza los ojos hacia "Theodora", en pie frente a ella. Caen lágrimas por las mejillas de la mutante.{/n} «Ha... ha vuelto...».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Idira turns her head to you, but her demented gaze only rests briefly on your face before sliding away. Up close you can see that the base of one of Idira's temple {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} has blackened and melted.{/n} "No... Wait... Lord Captain... Lady von Valancius!" {n}Idira raises her eyes to "Theodora," who stands before her. Tears stream down Idira's cheeks.{/n} "You... you came back..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Lord Capitán?». {n}Idira gira la cabeza hacia ti, pero su mirada demente solo se fija en ti durante un momento. De cerca puedes ver que la base de uno de los {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} de sus sienes ha ennegrecido y se ha derretido.{/n} «No... Espere... Lord Capitán... Lady von Valancius!». {n}Idira alza los ojos hacia "Theodora", en pie frente a ella. Caen lágrimas por las mejillas de la mutante.{/n} «Ha... ha vuelto...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン？」{n}イディラはあなたに顔を向けるが、その呆けたような視線はあなたの顔を少し見ただけで離れていく。よく見れば、イディラのこめかみの{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}の根元が黒く溶けているのがわかった。{/n}「いいえ…待って…ロード・キャプテン…レディ・フォン・ヴァランシウス！」{n}イディラは目の前に立つ『シオドーラ』に目を向ける。その頬を涙が伝う。{/n}「戻って…来てくれたのね…」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Idira turns her head to you, but her demented gaze only rests briefly on your face before sliding away. Up close you can see that the base of one of Idira's temple {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} has blackened and melted.{/n} "No... Wait... Lord Captain... Lady von Valancius!" {n}Idira raises her eyes to "Theodora," who stands before her. Tears stream down Idira's cheeks.{/n} "You... you came back..."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン？」{n}イディラはあなたに顔を向けるが、その呆けたような視線はあなたの顔を少し見ただけで離れていく。よく見れば、イディラのこめかみの{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}の根元が黒く溶けているのがわかった。{/n}「いいえ…待って…ロード・キャプテン…レディ・フォン・ヴァランシウス！」{n}イディラは目の前に立つ『シオドーラ』に目を向ける。その頬を涙が伝う。{/n}「戻って…来てくれたのね…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Idira wendet sich dir zu, doch ihre wahnsinnigen Augen ruhen nur für einen kurzen Moment auf dir, ehe sie ihren Blick abwendet. Aus der Nähe erkennst du, dass die Basis eines der {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} an Idiras Schläfen geschmolzen und geschwärzt ist.{/n} "Nein ... Wartet ... Lord Captain ... Lady von Valancius!" {n}Idira richtet ihren Blick auf 'Theodora', die vor ihr steht. Über Idiras Wangen laufen Tränen.{/n} "Ihr ... Ihr seid zurückgekehrt ..."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Idira turns her head to you, but her demented gaze only rests briefly on your face before sliding away. Up close you can see that the base of one of Idira's temple {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} has blackened and melted.{/n} "No... Wait... Lord Captain... Lady von Valancius!" {n}Idira raises her eyes to "Theodora," who stands before her. Tears stream down Idira's cheeks.{/n} "You... you came back..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Idira wendet sich dir zu, doch ihre wahnsinnigen Augen ruhen nur für einen kurzen Moment auf dir, ehe sie ihren Blick abwendet. Aus der Nähe erkennst du, dass die Basis eines der {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} an Idiras Schläfen geschmolzen und geschwärzt ist.{/n} "Nein ... Wartet ... Lord Captain ... Lady von Valancius!" {n}Idira richtet ihren Blick auf 'Theodora', die vor ihr steht. Über Idiras Wangen laufen Tränen.{/n} "Ihr ... Ihr seid zurückgekehrt ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}Idira se tourne vers vous, mais son regard d'aliénée ne se pose que brièvement sur votre visage avant de dériver à nouveau. À y regarder de plus près, vous vous apercevez que la base de l'un de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} temporaux est noircie et à moitié fondue.{/n} « Non... Attendez... Seigneure-capitaine... Dame von Valancius ! » {n}Les joues striées de larmes, Idira lève les yeux vers « Théodora », qui la domine de tout son haut.{/n} « Vous... vous êtes revenue... »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Idira turns her head to you, but her demented gaze only rests briefly on your face before sliding away. Up close you can see that the base of one of Idira's temple {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} has blackened and melted.{/n} "No... Wait... Lord Captain... Lady von Valancius!" {n}Idira raises her eyes to "Theodora," who stands before her. Tears stream down Idira's cheeks.{/n} "You... you came back..."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}Idira se tourne vers vous, mais son regard d'aliénée ne se pose que brièvement sur votre visage avant de dériver à nouveau. À y regarder de plus près, vous vous apercevez que la base de l'un de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} temporaux est noircie et à moitié fondue.{/n} « Non... Attendez... Seigneure-capitaine... Dame von Valancius ! » {n}Les joues striées de larmes, Idira lève les yeux vers « Théodora », qui la domine de tout son haut.{/n} « Vous... vous êtes revenue... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan?" {n}Başını sana doğru çeviren İdira, delirmiş bakışlarını kısa bir süre doğrultup ardından kaçırıyor. Yaklaşınca İdira'nın şakaklarındaki {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantlardan{/g} birinin kökten kararıp eridiğini görüyorsun.{/n} "Hayır... Olamaz... Lord Kaptan... Leydi von Valancius!" {n}İdira, önünde duran "Theodora"ya gözlerini dikiyor, yanaklarından gözyaşları süzülüyor.{/n} "Geri... Geri döndün..."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Idira turns her head to you, but her demented gaze only rests briefly on your face before sliding away. Up close you can see that the base of one of Idira's temple {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} has blackened and melted.{/n} "No... Wait... Lord Captain... Lady von Valancius!" {n}Idira raises her eyes to "Theodora," who stands before her. Tears stream down Idira's cheeks.{/n} "You... you came back..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan?" {n}İdira başını sana doğru çeviriyor ama delirmiş bakışları yüzünde kısa bir süre durup kaçıyor. Yaklaşınca İdira'nın şakaklarındaki {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}lardan birinin kökten kararıp eridiğini görüyorsun.{/n} "Hayır... Olamaz... Lord Kaptan... Leydi von Valancius!" {n}İdira, gözlerini önünde duran "Theodora"ya dikiyor. İdira'nın yanaklarından gözyaşları süzülüyor.{/n} "Geri... Geri döndün..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
